bottom.template: the distance from the bottom of the page is {value}

left.template: the distance from the left of the page is {value}

top.template: the distance from the top of the page is {value}

align-self.template: the way in which this flex element is aligned is {value}

flex.template: the properties of this flex element are {value}

flex-direction.template: this element's children are arranged in a {value}

flex-shrink.template: this flex element will shrink {value} amount

flex-wrap.template: the child flex elements' wrapping will is {value}

justify-content.template: the child flex element's content will be justified {value}

order.template: the order in a flex container is {value}

line-break.template: the way in which a line break will occur is {value}

overflow-wrap.template: the behaviour when text overflows is {value}

text-align-last.template: the alignment of text just before a line break is {value}

text-indent.template: the indentation of the first line of text is {value}

text-transform.template: the transformation applied to the text is {value}
